Description: Base of a pottery bowl bearing 2 lines of cursive Greek text or possibly Meroitic characters.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: West Bank Survey of Sudanese Lower Nubia
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Abdel Qadir, 24-E-21/181 'factory' Also marked: '24-E1/6d Room 12'
